title: The Gentle Giant of the Sea
description: Whales are large marine mammals known for their intelligence and complex social behaviors. There are two main groups: toothed whales and baleen whales.

questions.question: What is the largest living animal on Earth?
Which of the following is a collective noun for a group of whales?
How do baleen whales eat?
options: They use their teeth to chew their food
They filter-feed using baleen plates to trap small organisms
They use their tongues to scoop up food
They are vegetarians and eat plants
questions.correct_answer: They filter-feed using baleen plates to trap small organisms

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a whale's blowhole?
Which whale species is known for its long, complex songs?
